name: PLSDA
description: PLS Discriminant Analysis (PLS-DA) classifier.
longDescription: PLS-DA for classification problems using dummy variable encoding.

name: OPLS
description: Orthogonal PLS (OPLS) regressor.
longDescription: Orthogonal Partial Least Squares separates systematic variation into predictive and orthogonal components.

name: OPLSDA
description: Orthogonal PLS Discriminant Analysis (OPLS-DA) classifier.
longDescription: OPLS combined with discriminant analysis for classification.

name: IKPLS
description: Improved Kernel PLS (IKPLS) regressor.
longDescription: Optimized PLS algorithm with improved computational efficiency.

name: SparsePLS
description: Sparse PLS (sPLS) regressor with L1 regularization.
longDescription: PLS with sparsity constraint for automatic variable selection.

name: LWPLS
description: Locally-Weighted Partial Least Squares (LWPLS) regressor.
longDescription: Local PLS models weighted by sample similarity for non-linear relationships.

name: IntervalPLS
description: Interval Partial Least Squares (iPLS) regressor.
longDescription: Divides spectrum into intervals and selects the most informative ones.

name: RobustPLS
description: Robust Partial Least Squares (Robust PLS) regressor.
longDescription: PLS with robust estimation methods for handling outliers.

name: SIMPLS
description: SIMPLS (Simple PLS) regressor.
longDescription: Statistically Inspired Modification of PLS - faster and numerically stable.

name: RecursivePLS
description: Recursive Partial Least Squares (Recursive PLS) regressor.
longDescription: Online/adaptive PLS that updates with new samples.

name: KOPLS
description: Kernel Orthogonal PLS (K-OPLS) regressor.
longDescription: Combines kernel methods with orthogonal PLS for non-linear modeling.

name: FCKPLS
description: Fractional Convolutional Kernel PLS (FCK-PLS).
longDescription: Advanced kernel PLS with fractional convolution for spectral data.

name: MetaModel
description: Wrapper for meta-model stacking using pipeline predictions.
longDescription: Meta-learner that combines predictions from multiple base models (stacking ensemble).

name: DiPLS
description: Dynamic PLS (DiPLS) regressor.

name: KPLS
description: Nonlinear PLS using Kernel Methods (Kernel PLS / NL-PLS).

name: MBPLS
description: Multiblock PLS (MB-PLS) regressor.

name: OKLMPLS
description: Online Koopman Latent-Mode Partial Least Squares (OKLM-PLS).

name: SavitzkyGolay
description: A class for smoothing and differentiating data using the Savitzky-Golay filter.
longDescription: Savitzky-Golay filter for smoothing or computing derivatives while preserving spectral features. Window length must be odd.

name: FirstDerivative
description: First numerical derivative using numpy.gradient.
longDescription: Computes the first derivative of spectra, useful for removing constant baseline offsets.

name: SecondDerivative
description: Second numerical derivative using numpy.gradient.
longDescription: Computes the second derivative of spectra, useful for resolving overlapping peaks.

name: Gaussian
description: nirs4all preprocessing Gaussian
longDescription: Applies Gaussian convolution for smoothing spectra.

name: Detrend
description: Perform spectral detrending to remove linear trend from data.
longDescription: Removes polynomial trends from spectra using least squares fitting.

name: ASLSBaseline
description: Asymmetric Least Squares (AsLS) baseline correction.
longDescription: Asymmetric Least Squares Smoothing baseline estimation.

name: SNIP
description: Statistics-sensitive Non-linear Iterative Peak-clipping baseline correction.
longDescription: SNIP algorithm for baseline estimation using iterative peak clipping.

name: RollingBall
description: Rolling Ball baseline correction.
longDescription: Rolling ball algorithm for baseline estimation.

name: ReflectanceToAbsorbance
description: Convert reflectance spectra to absorbance using Beer-Lambert law.
longDescription: Converts reflectance data to absorbance using the Beer-Lambert law: A = -log10(R).

name: LogTransform
description: Elementwise logarithm with automatic handling of edge cases.
longDescription: Applies logarithmic transformation to spectral data.

name: ToAbsorbance
description: Convert reflectance or transmittance to absorbance.
longDescription: Converts spectral data to absorbance format.

name: FromAbsorbance
description: Convert absorbance to reflectance or transmittance.
longDescription: Converts spectral data from absorbance format.

name: KubelkaMunk
description: Apply Kubelka-Munk transformation for diffuse reflectance.
longDescription: Applies Kubelka-Munk transformation for diffuse reflectance spectra.

name: CARS
description: Competitive Adaptive Reweighted Sampling (CARS) for wavelength selection.
longDescription: Variable selection method that uses PLS to iteratively select important wavelengths.

name: MCUVE
description: Monte-Carlo Uninformative Variable Elimination (MC-UVE) for wavelength selection.
longDescription: Removes uninformative variables using Monte Carlo sampling.

name: CropTransformer
description: nirs4all preprocessing CropTransformer
longDescription: Crops spectra to a specific wavelength range by index.

name: Resampler
description: Resample spectral data to new wavelength grid using interpolation.
longDescription: Resamples spectra to a specified number of points using interpolation.

name: Normalize
description: Normalize spectrum using either custom range of linalg normalization
longDescription: Normalizes samples individually to unit norm.

name: Haar
description: Shortcut to the Wavelet haar transform.
longDescription: Applies Haar wavelet decomposition for feature extraction.

name: Wavelet
description: Single level Discrete Wavelet Transform.
longDescription: General wavelet transform for denoising and feature extraction.

name: WaveletPCA
description: Multi-scale PCA on wavelet coefficients.
longDescription: Combines wavelet decomposition with PCA for dimensionality reduction.

name: AirPLS
description: Adaptive Iteratively Reweighted Penalized Least Squares baseline correction.

name: ArPLS
description: Asymmetrically Reweighted Penalized Least Squares baseline correction.

name: AreaNormalization
description: Area normalization of spectra.

name: Baseline
description: Removes baseline (mean) from each spectrum.

name: BEADS
description: Baseline Estimation And Denoising with Sparsity.

name: Derivate
description: nirs4all preprocessing Derivate

name: ExtendedMultiplicativeScatterCorrection
description: Extended Multiplicative Scatter Correction (EMSC).

name: FlattenPreprocessing
description: Flatten the preprocessing dimension of a 3D feature array.

name: FlexiblePCA
description: PCA with flexible component specification.

name: FlexibleSVD
description: Truncated SVD with flexible component specification.

name: FractionToPercent
description: Convert fractional [0, 1] values to percentage [0, 100] range.

name: IModPoly
description: Improved Modified Polynomial baseline correction.

name: IASLS
description: Improved Asymmetric Least Squares baseline correction.

name: LocalStandardNormalVariate
description: Local Standard Normal Variate (LSNV).

name: ModPoly
description: Modified Polynomial baseline correction.

name: MultiplicativeScatterCorrection
description: nirs4all preprocessing MultiplicativeScatterCorrection

name: PercentToFraction
description: Convert percentage values to fractional [0, 1] range.

name: PyBaselineCorrection
description: General baseline correction using pybaselines library.

name: ResampleTransformer
description: nirs4all preprocessing ResampleTransformer

name: RobustStandardNormalVariate
description: Robust Standard Normal Variate (RSNV).

name: SignalTypeConverter
description: General-purpose signal type converter.

name: SimpleScale
description: nirs4all preprocessing SimpleScale

name: StandardNormalVariate
description: Standard Normal Variate (SNV) transformation.

name: WaveletFeatures
description: Discrete Wavelet Transform feature extractor for spectral data.

name: WaveletSVD
description: Multi-scale SVD on wavelet coefficients.

name: BinnedStratifiedGroupKFold
description: Stratified Group K-Fold cross-validator with binned continuous targets.

name: KBinsStratifiedSplitter
description: Implements stratified sampling using KBins discretization.

name: KMeansSplitter
description: Implements sampling using K-Means clustering.

name: KennardStoneSplitter
description: Implements the Kennard-Stone sampling method based on maximum minimum distance.

name: SPlitSplitter
description: Implements the SPlit sampling.

name: SPXYSplitter
description: Implements the SPXY sampling method.

name: SPXYGFold
description: SPXY-based K-Fold splitter with group awareness.

name: SystematicCircularSplitter
description: Implements the systematic circular sampling method.

name: GaussianAdditiveNoise
description: Adds Gaussian noise to the spectra.
longDescription: Adds Gaussian random noise to spectral data with optional kernel smoothing for correlated noise simulation. X_aug = X + noise.

name: MultiplicativeNoise
description: Multiplies spectra by a random gain factor.
longDescription: Applies multiplicative noise to simulate gain variations. X_aug = (1 + epsilon) * X.

name: SpikeNoise
description: Adds spikes to the spectrum.
longDescription: Adds sharp spike artifacts at random wavelengths. Simulates cosmic ray hits, electrical interference, or single-point measurement errors.

name: LinearBaselineDrift
description: Adds a linear baseline drift.
longDescription: Simulates linear baseline drift by adding a random offset and slope to spectra. X_aug = X + a + b * wavelength.

name: PolynomialBaselineDrift
description: Adds a polynomial baseline drift.
longDescription: Adds a random polynomial baseline drift to spectra. Higher degree polynomials can simulate more complex baseline distortions.

name: WavelengthShift
description: Shifts the wavelength axis.
longDescription: Simulates wavelength calibration errors by shifting spectra along the x-axis. Uses interpolation to resample at original wavelength positions.

name: WavelengthStretch
description: Stretches or compresses the wavelength axis.
longDescription: Stretches or compresses the wavelength axis around the center wavelength. Simulates slight instrument-to-instrument wavelength calibration differences.

name: LocalWavelengthWarp
description: Applies a non-linear warp to the wavelength axis.
longDescription: Applies a non-linear warp to the wavelength axis using spline-interpolated random shifts at control points. Simulates local wavelength distortions.

name: SmoothMagnitudeWarp
description: Multiplies the spectrum by a smooth curve.
longDescription: Multiplies the spectrum by a smooth random gain curve generated from spline-interpolated control points. Simulates smooth wavelength-dependent instrument response variations.

name: BandPerturbation
description: Perturbs specific bands of the spectrum.
longDescription: Perturbs random spectral bands by applying multiplicative gain and additive offset within selected regions. Simulates localized instrument artifacts.

name: GaussianSmoothingJitter
description: Applies Gaussian smoothing with random sigma.
longDescription: Applies Gaussian smoothing with a randomly varying sigma to simulate spectral resolution differences between instruments.

name: UnsharpSpectralMask
description: Applies unsharp masking (sharpening).
longDescription: Applies unsharp masking (sharpening) to spectra. X_aug = X + k * (X - smooth(X)). Enhances fine spectral features with random intensity.

name: BandMasking
description: Masks out bands of the spectrum.
longDescription: Masks out random spectral bands by either zeroing or interpolating across the region. Simulates missing or corrupted spectral regions.

name: ChannelDropout
description: Drops individual wavelengths (sets to zero or interpolates).
longDescription: Drops individual wavelengths with a given probability, replacing them with zero or interpolated values. Simulates random dead pixels or single-channel corruption.

name: LocalClipping
description: Clips values in a local region to simulate saturation.
longDescription: Clips spectral values in random local regions to the 90th percentile of the segment. Simulates detector saturation or peak flattening artifacts.

name: MixupAugmenter
description: Mixup augmentation.
longDescription: Creates new samples by blending pairs of existing samples using Beta distribution weights. X_aug = lambda * X_i + (1 - lambda) * X_j.

name: LocalMixupAugmenter
description: Mixup with nearest neighbors.
longDescription: Creates new samples by blending each sample with one of its k-nearest neighbors using Beta distribution weights. Produces more realistic augmentations than global mixup.

name: ScatterSimulationMSC
description: Simulates scatter variation: x_aug = a + b * x
longDescription: Simulates scatter variation using a simple MSC-style model: x_aug = a + b * x. Can use self-reference or global mean as the reference spectrum.

name: ParticleSizeAugmenter
description: Simulate particle size effects on scattering for data augmentation.
longDescription: Simulates particle size effects on NIR spectra through wavelength-dependent baseline scattering (lambda^(-n) relationship), path length changes, and scatter noise. Smaller particles cause increased scattering at shorter wavelengths.

name: EMSCDistortionAugmenter
description: Apply EMSC-style scatter distortions for data augmentation.
longDescription: Simulates the spectral distortions that EMSC corrects: x_distorted = a + b*x + c1*lambda + c2*lambda^2 + ... Useful for training scatter-robust models or simulating instrument transfer.

name: TemperatureAugmenter
description: Simulate temperature-induced spectral changes for data augmentation.
longDescription: Simulates temperature effects on NIR spectra including peak position shifts (O-H, N-H bands), intensity changes from hydrogen bonding disruption, and band broadening from thermal motion. Uses literature-based region-specific parameters.

name: MoistureAugmenter
description: Simulate moisture-induced spectral changes for data augmentation.
longDescription: Simulates moisture and water activity effects on NIR spectra. Water activity shifts water bands between free and bound states, affecting peak positions and intensities in the O-H regions.

name: BatchEffectAugmenter
description: Simulates batch/session effects in spectroscopic measurements.

name: DeadBandAugmenter
description: Simulates dead spectral bands (detector saturation/failure regions).

name: DetectorRollOffAugmenter
description: Simulate detector sensitivity roll-off at spectral edges.

name: EdgeArtifactsAugmenter
description: Combined augmenter for edge-related spectral artifacts.

name: EdgeCurvatureAugmenter
description: Simulate edge curvature and baseline bending at spectral boundaries.

name: HeteroscedasticNoiseAugmenter
description: Simulates signal-dependent (heteroscedastic) detector noise.

name: InstrumentalBroadeningAugmenter
description: Simulates instrumental spectral broadening.

name: PathLengthAugmenter
description: Simulates optical path length variation.

name: Random_X_Operation
description: Class for applying random operation on data augmentation.

name: Rotate_Translate
description: Class for rotating and translating data augmentation.

name: Spline_Curve_Simplification
description: Class to simplify a 1D signal using B-spline interpolation along the curve.

name: Spline_Smoothing
description: Class to apply a smoothing spline to a 1D signal.

name: Spline_X_Perturbations
description: Class to apply a perturbation to a 1D signal using B-spline interpolation.

name: Spline_X_Simplification
description: Class to simplify a 1D signal using B-spline interpolation along the x-axis.

name: Spline_Y_Perturbations
description: Augment the data with a perturbation on the y-axis using B-spline interpolation.

name: StrayLightAugmenter
description: Simulate stray light effects on NIR spectra.

name: TruncatedPeakAugmenter
description: Simulate truncated absorption peaks at spectral boundaries.

name: HighLeverageFilter
description: Filter high-leverage samples that may unduly influence the model.

name: MetadataFilter
description: Filter samples based on metadata column values.

name: SpectralQualityFilter
description: Filter samples with poor spectral quality.

name: XOutlierFilter
description: Filter samples with outlier spectral features.

name: YOutlierFilter
description: Filter samples with outlier target values.

name: IntegerKBinsDiscretizer
description: KBinsDiscretizer qui retourne des entiers au lieu de floats

name: RangeDiscretizer
description: nirs4all y_processing RangeDiscretizer

name: PLSRegression
description: PLS regression.
longDescription: PLS regression with NIPALS algorithm. The gold standard for spectroscopic calibration.

name: Ridge
description: Linear least squares with l2 regularization.
longDescription: Linear regression with L2 regularization to prevent overfitting.

name: Lasso
description: Linear Model trained with L1 prior as regularizer (aka the Lasso).
longDescription: Linear regression with L1 regularization for feature selection.

name: ElasticNet
description: Linear regression with combined L1 and L2 priors as regularizer.
longDescription: Linear regression combining L1 and L2 regularization.

name: SVR
description: Epsilon-Support Vector Regression.
longDescription: Epsilon-Support Vector Regression using kernel methods.

name: SVC
description: C-Support Vector Classification.
longDescription: C-Support Vector Classification using kernel methods.

name: RandomForestRegressor
description: A random forest regressor.
longDescription: Ensemble of decision trees for regression with bagging.

name: RandomForestClassifier
description: A random forest classifier.
longDescription: Ensemble of decision trees for classification with bagging.

name: AdaBoostClassifier
description: An AdaBoost classifier.

name: AdaBoostRegressor
description: An AdaBoost regressor.

name: ARDRegression
description: Bayesian ARD regression.

name: BaggingClassifier
description: A Bagging classifier.

name: BaggingRegressor
description: A Bagging regressor.

name: BayesianRidge
description: Bayesian ridge regression.

name: BernoulliNB
description: Naive Bayes classifier for multivariate Bernoulli models.

name: CalibratedClassifierCV
description: Calibrate probabilities using isotonic, sigmoid, or temperature scaling.

name: CategoricalNB
description: Naive Bayes classifier for categorical features.

name: CCA
description: Canonical Correlation Analysis, also known as "Mode B" PLS.

name: ClassifierChain
description: A multi-label model that arranges binary classifiers into a chain.

name: ComplementNB
description: The Complement Naive Bayes classifier described in Rennie et al. (2003).

name: DecisionTreeClassifier
description: A decision tree classifier.

name: DecisionTreeRegressor
description: A decision tree regressor.

name: DummyClassifier
description: DummyClassifier makes predictions that ignore the input features.

name: DummyRegressor
description: Regressor that makes predictions using simple rules.

name: ElasticNetCV
description: Elastic Net model with iterative fitting along a regularization path.

name: ExtraTreeClassifier
description: An extremely randomized tree classifier.

name: ExtraTreeRegressor
description: An extremely randomized tree regressor.

name: ExtraTreesClassifier
description: An extra-trees classifier.

name: ExtraTreesRegressor
description: An extra-trees regressor.

name: FixedThresholdClassifier
description: Binary classifier that manually sets the decision threshold.

name: GammaRegressor
description: Generalized Linear Model with a Gamma distribution.

name: GaussianNB
description: Gaussian Naive Bayes (GaussianNB).

name: GaussianProcessClassifier
description: Gaussian process classification (GPC) based on Laplace approximation.

name: GaussianProcessRegressor
description: Gaussian process regression (GPR).

name: GradientBoostingClassifier
description: Gradient Boosting for classification.

name: GradientBoostingRegressor
description: Gradient Boosting for regression.

name: HistGradientBoostingClassifier
description: Histogram-based Gradient Boosting Classification Tree.

name: HistGradientBoostingRegressor
description: Histogram-based Gradient Boosting Regression Tree.

name: HuberRegressor
description: L2-regularized linear regression model that is robust to outliers.

name: IsotonicRegression
description: Isotonic regression model.

name: KNeighborsClassifier
description: Classifier implementing the k-nearest neighbors vote.

name: KNeighborsRegressor
description: Regression based on k-nearest neighbors.

name: KernelRidge
description: Kernel ridge regression.

name: LabelPropagation
description: Label Propagation classifier.

name: LabelSpreading
description: LabelSpreading model for semi-supervised learning.

name: Lars
description: Least Angle Regression model a.k.a. LAR.

name: LarsCV
description: Cross-validated Least Angle Regression model.

name: LassoCV
description: Lasso linear model with iterative fitting along a regularization path.

name: LassoLars
description: Lasso model fit with Least Angle Regression a.k.a. Lars.

name: LassoLarsCV
description: Cross-validated Lasso, using the LARS algorithm.

name: LassoLarsIC
description: Lasso model fit with Lars using BIC or AIC for model selection.

name: LinearDiscriminantAnalysis
description: Linear Discriminant Analysis.

name: LinearRegression
description: Ordinary least squares Linear Regression.

name: LinearSVC
description: Linear Support Vector Classification.

name: LinearSVR
description: Linear Support Vector Regression.

name: LogisticRegression
description: Logistic Regression (aka logit, MaxEnt) classifier.

name: LogisticRegressionCV
description: Logistic Regression CV (aka logit, MaxEnt) classifier.

name: MLPClassifier
description: Multi-layer Perceptron classifier.

name: MLPRegressor
description: Multi-layer Perceptron regressor.

name: MultiOutputClassifier
description: Multi target classification.

name: MultiOutputRegressor
description: Multi target regression.

name: MultiTaskElasticNet
description: Multi-task ElasticNet model trained with L1/L2 mixed-norm as regularizer.

name: MultiTaskElasticNetCV
description: Multi-task L1/L2 ElasticNet with built-in cross-validation.

name: MultiTaskLasso
description: Multi-task Lasso model trained with L1/L2 mixed-norm as regularizer.

name: MultiTaskLassoCV
description: Multi-task Lasso model trained with L1/L2 mixed-norm as regularizer.

name: MultinomialNB
description: Naive Bayes classifier for multinomial models.

name: NearestCentroid
description: Nearest centroid classifier.

name: NuSVC
description: Nu-Support Vector Classification.

name: NuSVR
description: Nu Support Vector Regression.

name: OneVsOneClassifier
description: One-vs-one multiclass strategy.

name: OneVsRestClassifier
description: One-vs-the-rest (OvR) multiclass strategy.

name: OrthogonalMatchingPursuit
description: Orthogonal Matching Pursuit model (OMP).

name: OrthogonalMatchingPursuitCV
description: Cross-validated Orthogonal Matching Pursuit model (OMP).

name: OutputCodeClassifier
description: (Error-Correcting) Output-Code multiclass strategy.

name: PassiveAggressiveClassifier
description: Passive Aggressive Classifier.

name: PassiveAggressiveRegressor
description: Passive Aggressive Regressor.

name: Perceptron
description: Linear perceptron classifier.

name: PLSCanonical
description: Partial Least Squares transformer and regressor.

name: PoissonRegressor
description: Generalized Linear Model with a Poisson distribution.

name: QuadraticDiscriminantAnalysis
description: Quadratic Discriminant Analysis.

name: QuantileRegressor
description: Linear regression model that predicts conditional quantiles.

name: RadiusNeighborsClassifier
description: Classifier implementing a vote among neighbors within a given radius.

name: RadiusNeighborsRegressor
description: Regression based on neighbors within a fixed radius.

name: RANSACRegressor
description: RANSAC (RANdom SAmple Consensus) algorithm.

name: RegressorChain
description: A multi-label model that arranges regressions into a chain.

name: RidgeClassifier
description: Classifier using Ridge regression.

name: RidgeClassifierCV
description: Ridge classifier with built-in cross-validation.

name: RidgeCV
description: Ridge regression with built-in cross-validation.

name: SelfTrainingClassifier
description: Self-training classifier.

name: SGDClassifier
description: Linear classifiers (SVM, logistic regression, etc.) with SGD training.

name: SGDRegressor
description: Linear model fitted by minimizing a regularized empirical loss with SGD.

name: StackingClassifier
description: Stack of estimators with a final classifier.

name: StackingRegressor
description: Stack of estimators with a final regressor.

name: TheilSenRegressor
description: Theil-Sen Estimator: robust multivariate regression model.

name: TransformedTargetRegressor
description: Meta-estimator to regress on a transformed target.

name: TunedThresholdClassifierCV
description: Classifier that post-tunes the decision threshold using cross-validation.

name: TweedieRegressor
description: Generalized Linear Model with a Tweedie distribution.

name: VotingClassifier
description: Soft Voting/Majority Rule classifier for unfitted estimators.

name: VotingRegressor
description: Prediction voting regressor for unfitted estimators.

name: StandardScaler
description: Standardize features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance.
longDescription: Standardizes features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance.

name: RobustScaler
description: Scale features using statistics that are robust to outliers.
longDescription: Scales features using statistics that are robust to outliers (median and IQR).

name: PCA
description: Principal component analysis (PCA).
longDescription: Reduces dimensionality by projecting data onto principal components that capture maximum variance.

name: TruncatedSVD
description: Dimensionality reduction using truncated SVD (aka LSA).
longDescription: Dimensionality reduction using truncated SVD. Unlike PCA, does not center data before computing SVD.

name: AdditiveChi2Sampler
description: Approximate feature map for additive chi2 kernel.

name: BernoulliRBM
description: Bernoulli Restricted Boltzmann Machine (RBM).

name: Binarizer
description: Binarize data (set feature values to 0 or 1) according to a threshold.

name: Birch
description: Implements the BIRCH clustering algorithm.

name: BisectingKMeans
description: Bisecting K-Means clustering.

name: ColumnTransformer
description: Applies transformers to columns of an array or pandas DataFrame.

name: DictVectorizer
description: Transforms lists of feature-value mappings to vectors.

name: DictionaryLearning
description: Dictionary learning.

name: FactorAnalysis
description: Factor Analysis (FA).

name: FastICA
description: FastICA: a fast algorithm for Independent Component Analysis.

name: FeatureAgglomeration
description: Agglomerate features.

name: FeatureHasher
description: Implements feature hashing, aka the hashing trick.

name: FeatureUnion
description: Concatenates results of multiple transformer objects.

name: FunctionTransformer
description: Constructs a transformer from an arbitrary callable.

name: GaussianRandomProjection
description: Reduce dimensionality through Gaussian random projection.

name: GenericUnivariateSelect
description: Univariate feature selector with configurable strategy.

name: HashingVectorizer
description: Convert a collection of text documents to a matrix of token occurrences.

name: IncrementalPCA
description: Incremental principal components analysis (IPCA).

name: Isomap
description: Isomap Embedding.

name: KBinsDiscretizer
description: Bin continuous data into intervals.

name: KMeans
description: K-Means clustering.

name: KNeighborsTransformer
description: Transform X into a (weighted) graph of k nearest neighbors.

name: KernelCenterer
description: Center an arbitrary kernel matrix :math:`K`.

name: KernelPCA
description: Kernel Principal component analysis (KPCA).

name: KNNImputer
description: Imputation for completing missing values using k-Nearest Neighbors.

name: LabelBinarizer
description: Binarize labels in a one-vs-all fashion.

name: LabelEncoder
description: Encode target labels with value between 0 and n_classes-1.

name: LatentDirichletAllocation
description: Latent Dirichlet Allocation with online variational Bayes algorithm.

name: LocallyLinearEmbedding
description: Locally Linear Embedding.

name: MaxAbsScaler
description: Scale each feature by its maximum absolute value.

name: MinMaxScaler
description: Transform features by scaling each feature to a given range.

name: MiniBatchDictionaryLearning
description: Mini-batch dictionary learning.

name: MiniBatchKMeans
description: Mini-Batch K-Means clustering.

name: MiniBatchNMF
description: Mini-Batch Non-Negative Matrix Factorization (NMF).

name: MiniBatchSparsePCA
description: Mini-batch Sparse Principal Components Analysis.

name: MissingIndicator
description: Binary indicators for missing values.

name: MultiLabelBinarizer
description: Transform between iterable of iterables and a multilabel format.

name: NeighborhoodComponentsAnalysis
description: Neighborhood Components Analysis.

name: NMF
description: Non-Negative Matrix Factorization (NMF).

name: Normalizer
description: Normalize samples individually to unit norm.

name: Nystroem
description: Approximate a kernel map using a subset of the training data.

name: OneHotEncoder
description: Encode categorical features as a one-hot numeric array.

name: OrdinalEncoder
description: Encode categorical features as an integer array.

name: PatchExtractor
description: Extracts patches from a collection of images.

name: PLSSVD
description: Partial Least Square SVD.

name: PolynomialCountSketch
description: Polynomial kernel approximation via Tensor Sketch.

name: PolynomialFeatures
description: Generate polynomial and interaction features.

name: PowerTransformer
description: Apply a power transform featurewise to make data more Gaussian-like.

name: QuantileTransformer
description: Transform features using quantiles information.

name: RadiusNeighborsTransformer
description: Transform X into a (weighted) graph of neighbors nearer than a radius.

name: RandomTreesEmbedding
description: An ensemble of totally random trees.

name: RBFSampler
description: Approximate a RBF kernel feature map using random Fourier features.

name: RFE
description: Feature ranking with recursive feature elimination.

name: RFECV
description: Recursive feature elimination with cross-validation to select features.

name: SelectFdr
description: Filter: Select the p-values for an estimated false discovery rate.

name: SelectFpr
description: Filter: Select the pvalues below alpha based on a FPR test.

name: SelectFromModel
description: Meta-transformer for selecting features based on importance weights.

name: SelectFwe
description: Filter: Select the p-values corresponding to Family-wise error rate.

name: SelectKBest
description: Select features according to the k highest scores.

name: SelectPercentile
description: Select features according to a percentile of the highest scores.

name: SequentialFeatureSelector
description: Transformer that performs Sequential Feature Selection.

name: SimpleImputer
description: Univariate imputer for completing missing values with simple strategies.

name: SkewedChi2Sampler
description: Approximate feature map for "skewed chi-squared" kernel.

name: SparseCoder
description: Sparse coding.

name: SparsePCA
description: Sparse Principal Components Analysis (SparsePCA).

name: SparseRandomProjection
description: Reduce dimensionality through sparse random projection.

name: SplineTransformer
description: Generate univariate B-spline bases for features.

name: TargetEncoder
description: Target Encoder for regression and classification targets.

name: TfidfTransformer
description: Transform a count matrix to a normalized tf or tf-idf representation.

name: TSNE
description: T-distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding.

name: VarianceThreshold
description: Feature selector that removes all low-variance features.

name: ShuffleSplit
description: Random permutation cross-validator.
longDescription: Generates random train/test indices for multiple iterations.

name: LeaveOneOut
description: Leave-One-Out cross-validator.
longDescription: Each sample is used once as test set while remaining samples form training set.

name: GroupShuffleSplit
description: Shuffle-Group(s)-Out cross-validation iterator.
longDescription: Random train/test splits with group awareness.

name: GroupKFold
description: K-fold iterator variant with non-overlapping groups.

name: KFold
description: K-Fold cross-validator.

name: LeaveOneGroupOut
description: Leave One Group Out cross-validator.

name: LeavePGroupsOut
description: Leave P Group(s) Out cross-validator.

name: LeavePOut
description: Leave-P-Out cross-validator.

name: PredefinedSplit
description: Predefined split cross-validator.

name: RepeatedKFold
description: Repeated K-Fold cross validator.

name: RepeatedStratifiedKFold
description: Repeated class-wise stratified K-Fold cross validator.

name: StratifiedGroupKFold
description: Class-wise stratified K-Fold iterator variant with non-overlapping groups.

name: StratifiedKFold
description: Class-wise stratified K-Fold cross-validator.

name: StratifiedShuffleSplit
description: Class-wise stratified ShuffleSplit cross-validator.

name: TimeSeriesSplit
description: Time Series cross-validator.

name: StandardScaler
description: Standardize features by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance.
longDescription: Standardizes targets by removing the mean and scaling to unit variance.

name: MinMaxScaler
description: Transform features by scaling each feature to a given range.
longDescription: Transforms targets by scaling each to a given range (default 0-1).

name: RobustScaler
description: Scale features using statistics that are robust to outliers.
longDescription: Scales targets using statistics that are robust to outliers (median and IQR).

name: PowerTransformer
description: Apply a power transform featurewise to make data more Gaussian-like.
longDescription: Apply a power transform to make target data more Gaussian-like.

name: QuantileTransformer
description: Transform features using quantiles information.
longDescription: Transform targets to follow a uniform or normal distribution using quantiles.

name: MaxAbsScaler
description: Scale each feature by its maximum absolute value.
